name: Panos Couros
biography: Panos Couros is a sound designer whose more recent works include sound installations such as Sudden, at the Institute of Modern Art in Brisbane, theatre and dance scores for Thwack and Helmet, by choreographer Garry Stewart, #14 a multimedia event in Brisbane, and Inhabitation #2 a dance work by Tess de Quincey. He has composed CDROM sound designs for Pr?ternatural by Michele Barker and Dream Kitchen by Leon Cmielewski. He is currently the general manager for dLux media arts.
